name: Infinitree
description:
Ahhh an Infinity Tree in fall is quite a sight to behold. It's leaves gracefully diving down through the clouds. But when a tree grows to infinity, you never know what you'll find along it's trunk.

Guide the Infinity Tree's leaves on their journey down the never-ending giant. Glide back and forth dodging branches, birds, and who knows what else to help each leaf get as far as they can.

First in a series of monthly games, so look forward to more!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
